item.description: Join Deborah Hodiak-Knox for this FREE introductory class and find out who the angels are, what angel communication is and how it can be used to deepen your own sense of self. All we need to do is listen - and once we've figured out how to do that, trust. Trusting the guidance you recieve is the next step in connecting with your angels and living a life based on unconditional love and inner truth. Begin to more deeply trust what you already know. Details on how to sign up for the series will also be provided!

group.name: Abundance, Empowerment and the Law of Attraction

item.name: FREE Intro to Angel Communications
